stories.title: Apple tricked into releasing personal data used to sexually extort minors

stories.text:
I'm currently examining subscription aggregation vendors for both in-app and web based purchases. One of the vendors I'm looking at is Chargebee.

If you have previously used Chargebee, then I'd love to hear about your experience.
stories.title: Ask HN: What's Your Experience with Chargebee?
